meanings.sent1: She is proud to be nonobese and maintains a healthy lifestyle.
meanings.sent2: The doctor confirmed that she is nonobese and in good health.
meanings.sent3: Even her cat stays nonobese by playing and chasing toys all day.
meanings.sent4: The garden, with its nonobese plants, flourished under the care of the gardener.
meanings.sent5: The nonobese squirrel swiftly climbed the tree, showcasing its agility.

meanings.definition: A person who is not obese.
meanings.sent1: As a nonobese, she enjoys outdoor activities and sports.
meanings.sent2: The nonobese in the group had no trouble keeping up during the hike.
meanings.sent3: The nonobese at the party were the first to hit the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: In the race, the nonobese sprinter crossed the finish line with ease.
meanings.sent5: The nonobese student always packed a nutritious lunch for school.
